system.notes: Grants +10 to all Attack Rolls, +3 to Penetration of any weapon wielded by wearer. Increases Effective Rank by 1 for determining Squad Cohesion or for Ultramarine Chapter Abilities in Solo Mode.

description.value: Grants +10 to all Attack Rolls, +3 to Penetration of any weapon wielded by wearer. Increases Effective Rank by 1 for determining Squad Cohesion or for Ultramarine Chapter Abilities in Solo Mode.
